name: OperationSIN Gaming
description:
Hello SINNERS In a game where you will need to perform operation S.I.N. What Master HatoETH gave to You! You have arrived on the planet Grinders and Paperhands in OperationSIN galaxy Your task is to clear the planet of them by collecting ETH crystails And go through the map so that your spaceship can pick you up!

Worked on the game code and the game: Discord (Forbsy#9301), Twitter (baped4n) Worked on the design of game: Discord (kavilarava#2066) ,Twitter(polana_chudes)

I hope you will Enjoy the game,because we spent near a month for make it ♥
